/airdrop:
🎁 Dolphin Airdrop

• Stay active in Telegram & Discord for 1 month and get $5 in $DOLPHIN 🐬💸
• Invite program: Every valid invite = $0.5 in $DOLPHIN

How to join:
1) Join our channels
2) Stay active weekly
3) Invite quality friends (no bots)

Track invites in Telegram; top inviters get bonuses ⭐

/dao:
